title: skydiary
description: Write a daily entry and you're done. You get recaps and advice in total privacy with an AI friend, coach, and mentor.

top.heroDetail1: create personas with memories of your diary
top.heroDescription: write a daily entry about what's happening and click a button to get a new comment. it's super easy-to-use and totally private
top.privacyDetail1: your personal data is not tracked, profiled, or targeted in any way
top.privacyDetail2: your personal data is not visible to anyone except you
top.privacyDetail3: you can export or delete all your personal data at any time

about.title: about skydiary
about.description 0: the benefits of journaling are countless but you don't get any feedback.
about.description 1: with skydiary the process of writing is solitary and private.
about.description 2: you get totally private advice and counsel from different personas (powered by AI)
about.description 3: the emphasis is on simplicity. all you need to do is write a daily entry
about.description 4: you get automatic tags on your entry, recaps of your week, and advice or feedback when you want it
about.description 5: you can create a persona for anyone you want to talk to and learn new things you might not have imagined

company.title: about the team
company.description 0: skydiary is made by a husband (B) and wife (N). we craved feedback to keep us writing our journals daily because we know it helps in so many ways, so we started this project.
company.description 1: B is a software engineer and startup veteran. N is a writer and creator.
company.description 2: we're both passionate about technology, learning, and exploring our inner world. we love to share our knowledge and help others learn new things about the world and themselves.
company.description 3: we hope you'll enjoy using skydiary and help us make it better. we're open to feedback and suggestions.

features.title: features
features.heroTitle: what can you do with skydiary?

feature1.title: get personalized comments
feature1.description: get motivated to write with personalized, private comments from personas you create. learn new things, get new ideas, and see your life from many different points of view.

feature2.title: express yourself in privacy
feature2.description: your data is encrypted in transit and at rest. we don't read, sell, or mine your personal data. you can set your own encryption key we don't control. <privacy>read our privacy pledge</privacy>

feature3.title: create custom personas
feature3.description: want to talk to Caesar? want feedback from Cleopatra? how about an expert coach? create your own AI-powered personas and get personalized feedback.

miniFeature2.title: free data export at any time

miniFeature3.title: dark mode for late night journaling

privacyPledge.title: privacy pledge
privacyPledge.description: whether you call it a diary or a journal, it can become home to your innermost thoughts and feelings. your privacy is the base on which all our decisions are made.

detail1.title: modern, strong encryption
detail1.description: your data is transmitted to our servers and stored with the strongest available modern encryption. you can enable your own encryption key you control for next level security.

detail2.title: passcode keys
detail2.description: passwords are generally not a very secure way to protect your data. we send a new passcode that expires on every login. there's no password to steal and access your account.

detail3.title: no shoulder surfing
detail3.description: turn on no peeking mode to hide your journal entries by default, until you click or tap.

detail4.title: independent by design
detail4.description: we don't use third party providers for authentication. we aren't affiliated with large tech companies. our incentive is to help you, not shareholders.

detail5.title: minimum legal compliance
detail5.description: we review any law enforcment requests and push back if it is too expansive or intrusive. we require valid legal process before producing information, with one exception: if there is an immediate threat of serious physical injury or worse. in this case, we still only share your email address and device.

contact.title: contact us
contact.description: questions? feedback? we'd love to hear from you.
contact.subject: subject
contact.thankYouDescription: we'll get back to you soon.

privacy.title: privacy policy
privacy.description: we are dedicated to preserving your privacy. here's our privacy policy.

terms.title: terms of service
terms.description: these are the terms of service for skydiary.

auth.description: these details help to personalize your experience, privately.
auth.check your email: enter the code we sent to {email} to finish signing up.
auth.privacyAndTerms: By continuing, you agree to our <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink> and <termsLink>terms of service</termsLink>.

entry.limitDescription2: upgrade to skydiary plus to get more comments every day.

personas.newDescription: create a persona you want to get comments from on your daily entries
personas.name: name
personas.descriptionPlaceholder: they love to dance and sing.. they've been through a lot, and they've grown a lot.
personas.communicationSamplePlaceholder: if you can walk you can dance, if you can talk you can sing.
personas.limitDescription2: upgrade to skydiary plus to get more favorite personas.

settings.description: these details help to personalize your skydiary.
settings.deleteAccountDescription: this action is irreversible. ALL of your data wiil be permanently deleted.
settings.unsubscribeBeforeDeleteAccount: if you want to delete your account, you need to unsubscribe first
settings.exportDataDescription: this may take a few minutes.
settings.checkDownloadsFolder: export and download complete. check your downloads folder
settings.occupationPlaceholder: job title, student, housewife, retiree, volunteer, etc.

pricing.title: pricing & plans
pricing.emailWithDetails: a receipt has been sent to your registered email address
pricing.thankYouDetails: now you can use all features:

top.title: diary with feedback that's private
top.description: write a journal and get personalized feedback, for free. hear from advisors, characters, public figures, even you at another age. with private AI

about.title: about us
about.description: we're a husband and wife team based in Japan. we craved feedback to keep us writing our journals daily because we know it helps in so many ways.

features.title: features
features.description: skydiary is a journal that helps you write a daily entry and get personalized feedback. it's private, totally secure, and totally free.

privacyPledge.title: privacy pledge
privacyPledge.description: whether you call it a diary or a journal, it can become home to your innermost thoughts and feelings. we use skydiary ourselves, and we want privacy too. your privacy is the base on which all our decisions are made.

pricing.title: pricing
pricing.description: skydiary is free to use. for more comments, more personas, and a longer persona memory you can upgrade to a paid plan.

contact.description: questions? feedback? we'd love to hear from you.

privacy.description: we are dedicated to preserving your privacy. here's our privacy policy.
